item.title: Train a Named Entity Recognition (NER) Model Using FLAIR
item.description: tl;dr A step-by-step tutorial to train a state-of-the-art model for named entity recongition (NER), the task of identifying persons, organizations and locations from a piece of text. Practical Machine Learning - Learn Step-by-Step to Train a Model A great way to learn is by going step-by-step through the process of training and evaluating the model. Hit the Open in Colab button below to launch a Jupyter Notebook in the cloud with a step-by-step walkthrough.
